alert.note: Alert for Butler; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:37AM CDT until June 17 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Seward County in southeastern Nebraska... South central Butler County in east central Nebraska... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1237 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Staplehurst, or 7 miles northwest of Seward, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bee around 1245 AM CDT. Seward around 1250 AM CDT. Garland around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Pleasant Dale. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 385 and 388. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
